display_information.name: PAI Assistant
display_information.description: Personal AI Infrastructure - Claude-powered assistant with session persistence and memory extraction
display_information.long_description:
PAI Assistant integrates Claude AI with your Slack workspace. Features include:

• Thread-based session persistence - maintains conversation context across messages
• Memory extraction - captures goals, ideas, and important information using triggers
• Multi-channel support with per-channel configuration
• File upload/download capabilities
• HTTP API for programmatic access

Requires Bun runtime and PAI installation. See https://github.com/badosanjos/pai-packs for setup instructions.
